links:
<!-- the first 9 classes are obsolete and maintained only for backwards-compatability. -->
.body { font-size: 10px; line-height: 15px; font-family: Geneva, Verdana, Arial, Sans-Serif }
.fineprint { font-size: 9px; font-family: Geneva, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif }
.leaded { line-height: 18px }
.menuitem { color: #cc0000; font-size: 9px; font-family: Geneva, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif }
.quote { font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; font-family: Times, Serif; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 0pt }
.quotesig { font-style: italic; font-size: 12px; line-height: 22px; font-family: Times, Serif; margin-top: 20pt; margin-bottom: 5pt }
.size1 { font-size: 9px; font-family: Geneva, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif }
.size2 { font-size: 10px; font-family: Geneva, Verdana, Arial, Sans-Serif }
.size3 { font-size: 12px; font-family: Geneva, Verdana, Arial, Sans-Serif }
<!-- the classes above are obsolete and maintained only for backwards-compatability. -->

<!-- current css info follows -->
a.blkcrumb { color: #cccccc }
a.crumb { color: #666666; text-decoration: none }
a { color: #FF0000; }
a.footerlink  { font-size: 80%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-decoration: none; }
a.homeaa  { font-size: 95%; line-height: 140%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-decoration: none; }
a.homesubnav { font-weight: bold; font-size: small; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-decoration: none; color: #999999}

a:visited { color: #996666; }
.default { background-color: #ffffff }
a { color: #cc0000; }
a.sort       { color: black; font-size: 9px; font-family: Arial; text-decoration: none }
a.promoBlurb { color: black; font-size: 80%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-decoration: none }
.bio  { color: #666666; font-size: 80%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.bodytext  { font-size: 95%; line-height: 140%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.byline  { font-size: 80%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.caption { font-size: 80%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif ; color: #666666}
.pagination  { font-weight: bold; font-size: 80%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.captionHead  { font-weight: bold; font-size: 80%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.date { font-size: 80%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #666666 }
.deck { font-weight: bold; font-size: 80%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.head   { font-weight: bold; font-size: 13pt; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.indexblurb  { font-size: 80%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.indexblurbHead  { font-weight: bold; font-size: 80%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.inhex  { font-size: 80%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.largebody { font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.largehead   { font-weight: bold; font-size: 16pt; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.longblurb    { font-size: 80%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.longblurbHead  { font-weight: bold; font-size: 80%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.mainImgCaption { font-size: 80%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif ; color: #666666}
.prodtagline   { font-weight: bold; font-size: 13pt; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.pullquotenew   { color: #666666; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 23pt; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.sellingsubhead   { font-weight: bold; font-size: 14pt; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.sidebarBody  { font-size: small; line-height: 150%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.sidebarhead  { font-weight: bold; font-size: small; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.sidebarCaption { font-size: 80%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif ; color: #666666}
.sidebarCaptionHead  { font-weight: bold; font-size: 80%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.smallbody { font-size: 80%; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.storytitle   { font-weight: bold; font-size: 16pt; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.subhead  { font-weight: bold; font-size: small; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
.tipStep  { font-weight: bold; font-size: small; font-family: Verdana, Geneva, Helvetica, sans-serif }
